newsitem.title: HUNGARY: Hungary's BUX ends officially at 5,970.90 pts.
newsitem.headline: Hungary's BUX ends officially at 5,970.90 pts.

text.p: The BUX index of the Budapest Stock Exchange closed officially at 5,970.90 points, up 5.47, unchanged from the preliminary figures.
Spot share turnover totalled 7.76 billion forints, of which 5.37 billion was generated by MOL alone.
BUX futures settlement prices were mixed, rising for three maturities and falling also for three maturities.
June BUX settled at 6,254.5 points, down 18.50.
